mapper.insert: INSERT INTO _PROXY_CACHE(ID, NAME, META_SIZE_X, META_SIZE_Y, META_BUFFER, CACHE_TYPE, CACHE_DIRECTORY, FORMAT, GRIDS, SELECTED, IS_DEFAULT) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{metaSizeX}, #{metaSizeY}, #{metaBuffer}, #{cacheType}, #{cacheDirectory}, #{format}, #{grids}, #{selected}, #{isDefault})
mapper.select: SELECT S.* FROM _PROXY_CACHE_SOURCE_RELATION CS LEFT JOIN _PROXY_SOURCE S ON CS.SOURCE_ID = S.ID WHERE CS.CACHE_ID = #{cacheId}
